p: Six- to eight-week-old Swiss albino mice of either sex weighing 20â€“30 g were obtained from the animal house of School of Pharmacy and acclimatized to the laboratory environment for 1 week prior to the experimentation with a regular supply of standard pellets and water ad libitum. Animals were kept in a transparent cage and maintained under standard housing conditions with a 12 h light and dark cycle. 12, 13
